meanings.definition: The act of concentrating something to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: The hyperconcentration of sugar in the drink made it too sweet to drink.
meanings.sent2: The hyperconcentration of resources in one area led to neglect in other regions.
meanings.sent3: The hyperconcentration of toppings on the pizza made it look like a mountain of cheese and pepperoni.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperconcentration on her studies was like a laser beam, blocking out all distractions.
meanings.sent5: The hyperconcentration of stars in the night sky created a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: A state of being excessively concentrated.
meanings.sent1: The hyperconcentration of power in the hands of a few can lead to corruption.
meanings.sent2: The hyperconcentration of perfume in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The hyperconcentration of people on one side of the boat caused it to tip over.
meanings.sent4: The hyperconcentration of colors in the painting made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The hyperconcentration of traffic in the city center caused chaos during rush hour.
